content.p: The University of Nottingham collects and holds some personal information about how you use our website when you visit us.OKSee our policy Follow the links below to find members of staff you are looking for, their contact details and information about their teaching and research. Professor David Park Dean of Nottingham University Business School Paul Bartlam Head of Operations Janet Cooke Senior Operations Manager Professor Andrew Bacon Associate Dean for External Engagement Dr Frederique Bouilheres Associate Dean for Education and Student Experience Professor Aditya Jain Associate Dean for People and Culture Dr Alexander Trautrims Associate Dean for Research and Knowledge Exchange Professor Jane Frecknall-Hughes Accounting Professor Meryem Duygun Finance, Risk and Banking Professor Simon Mosey Haydn Green Institute for Innovation and Entrepreneurship Professor Kevin Amess Industrial Economics Professor Jillian Rickly Marketing Dr Jane Nolan Organisational Behaviour and Human Resource Management Dr Anne Touboulic Operations Management and Information Systems Our community of academics, researchers, lecturers and professional staff are supported in their career aspirations to develop the skills and experience needed to progress.
